'Allylpalladium(II) chloride dimer' is a chemical compound with the formula (Î· 3-
C 3H 5) 2Pd 2Cl 2. This yellow
air-stable compound is an important catalyst used in organic synthesis. Tatsuno, Y.; Yoshida, T.; Otsuka, S. "(Î· 3-
allyl)palladium(II) Complexes" Inorganic Syntheses, 1990, volume 28, pages 342-
345. ISBN 0-471-52619-3
